```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(WDI)

df <- WDI(country = c("PH","VN"),
          indicator = "NY.GDP.PCAP.KD",
          start = 1990)
```

```{r}
plot <- ggplot(df, aes(x = year, y = NY.GDP.PCAP.KD, color = country)) +
  geom_line()

plot
```
